import InputSearch from './components/InputSearch.js' import MainFooter from './components/MainFooter.js' import HomeContent from './pages/HomeContent.js' import SearchContent from './pages/SearchContent.js' import Details from './pages/Details.js' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from 'react' const App = () => { const [query, setQuery] = useState('') const updateQuery = (query) => { setQuery(query) } return (
); } export default App;
